data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 215,155 believers living in the state of San Miguel. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Miguel, El Salvador
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in San Miguel, El Salvador to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, for those in trouble in the state of San Miguel prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of San Miguel to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Turk people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in San Miguel with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in San Miguel, El Salvador.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.section_summary:
the state of San Miguel, El Salvador has a population of 478,800.

We estimate San Miguel has 215,155 people who might know Jesus, 237,094 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 26,551 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 215,155 believers in San Miguel to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 263,645 lost friends and neighbors.
